TopicTitle: How to use fixed cameras for recording in-game video?

Articles.Content: A lot of the fan-made videos I've seen have ships flying past cameras that are positioned in space somewhere, or have Kerbals walking around, or EVAing, but with a fixed camera position. How on earth(kerbin) do they do that? I've made one video, and would love to make some more, but I don't know how to do that camera trick, which opens up so much more posibility for cool videos.
KerbCam looks like exactly what I'm looking for. Thanks!
